summary:
At Vayu Technology, we believe that everyone should have access to the latest technologies and tools to help them achieve their fitness and wellness goals. That's why we are committed to making our solutions more accessible and affordable for everyone, without compromising on quality or performance.

Our cutting-edge solutions are disrupting the expensive, time-consuming, and fixed-setup biomechanics labs, and taking tracking capabilities beyond the known boundaries of smartphones and smartwatches. Our products are designed with a focus on user-centric design, ensuring that they meet the needs of our customers while delivering unparalleled performance.

With a team of experts in biomechanics, product design, and engineering, we are proud to be at the forefront of this transformative industry. Join us in our mission to create a brighter, healthier future for all, and experience the power of Vayu Technology.

currentPositions.description: Creating a world wherein everyone is a better version of themselves by providing personalized information to improve overall physical and emotional well-being.
currentPositions.title: Co-Founder and Inventor

projects.description:
Collaborated with a team on conceptualization and design of the initial engine, FIFO, scalar and Block read write functionality of a DDR2 memory controller in Verilog
The design was synthesized and optimized to work in 45nm technology with a clock speed of 500MHz.
We carried out layout of the synthesized design with Cadence Encounter P&R tool.
projects.title: Design and synthesis of DDR2 memory controller

projects.description:
•	Designed and created layout of 1.1V high speed flash ADC in 45nm technology 
•	Used CMOS dynamic clocked comparators with an input range of 0.55 to 1.07V.
•	Used a band gap reference to give a stable reference voltage for the comparator.
•	Used diodes with pads for ESD protection.
•	Simulated the design over PVT corners and found the variations to be less than 2mV.
•	Final Layout dimensions with pads and ESD protection : 540um x 460um  
Specifications:
Supply voltage : 1.1 V
Sampling Clock : 1Ghz
Input clock : 50Mhz
Input range : 0.5V to 1.07V
projects.title: Design and Layout of 8 bit Flash ADC in 45nm technology

projects.description:
Created and synthesized a maze routing algorithm using Lee’s Algorithm which reads the data from SRAM and writes the path back to it.
Key points of the design:
- Less Hardware than standard designs
- Less Time to complete routing. 
Can route 2 paths and can be extended to a number of paths.
projects.title: Design and Synthesis of Maze Router using Lee's Algorithm

projects.description:
•	Created the layout using tsmc02 180nm technology
•	Designed a 16-bit high speed Carry Look Ahead adders with dynamic adders to be used in the ALU. 
•	Designed a 16 bit wide 4 banked SRAM and created a layout for minimum area delay product. 
•	Used Column Interleaving to minimize area. 
•	Implemented an 8-bit Wallace Tree Multiplier using gated clocks with area delay and power optimization.
•	Integrated Perl scripts to automate the generation of test files and verification of results.
•	Average power consumption :7 mW and clock period: 2 ns
projects.title: Design and layout of 16-bit pipelined RISC processor with area-delay-power optimization

projects.description:
Designed and synthesized single clock FIFO with 
1. AE ,AF flags
2. N+1 pointer
3. fillcount
Designed and synthesized dual clock FIFO using N+1 pointer and gray code.
projects.title: Design and synthesis of Single and Dual Clock FIFO

projects.description:
2V high speed CMOS OpAmp was designed using IBM65nm technology.
Designed a supply independent PTAT DC bias  generator to provide the biasing to the Amplifier.
projects.title: Design of State of Art low volage high speed CMOS operational Amplifier

projects.description:
Designed a 4 bank 16 bit wide SRAM schematic and layout for minimum area delay product using tsmc02.
Used Column Interleaving to minimize area.
projects.title: Full Custom- Design and Layout of 1K SRAM with area-delay optimization

projects.description:
Implemented an 8-bit Wallace Tree Multiplier using gated clocks with area delay and power optimization.
Average power consumption :1mW and minimum clock : 3.7ns
projects.title: Full Custom Design and Layout of 8-bit 2’s Complement Multiplier with area delay

projects.description:
Built a Digital Neuron using technology tsmc02 with lambda 100nm. and optimized the area delay product.
Final area : 316.64 sq microns Delay 0.6ns. (Virtuoso)
projects.title: Digital Neuron

projects.description: Created Wallace Tree Multiplier and Variable Skip Adder using VerilogHDL. Designed Finite State machines using Xilinx ISE tool and verified functionality.
projects.title: Sequential and Combinational Circuits using Verilog

projects.description: Implementation of 5-stage Pipelined Processor using Verilog HDL. Designed Control Unit and Hazard Unit to avoid Hazards that can occur due to pipelining.
projects.title: 5-stage pipelined Processor

projects.description:
Conceptualized an Autonomous Library Robot which can place books in proper position and retrieves them on demand. (C++, Verilog, Ultiboard, Multisim)
Designed motor drivers, Microcontroller development board, Infrared sensors, shock absorbers and the grabbing mechanism.
projects.title: Autonomous Library assitance robot

projects.description: Engineered a security system which allows access to a restricted area only to the authorized users by identifying them by using their biometric traits (facial structure). (MATLAB, Ultiboard, Multisim)
projects.title: Face recognition based security system

projects.description: Built line following, grid solving , light sensing, temperature sensing robots
projects.title: Autonomous Robotics

patents.description: A portable, wearable multi-component measurement and analysis device can be utilized for collecting and analyzing bio-mechanical and human gait analysis data while performing any physical activity. This device may be constructed with one or more sensors that are placed on the various localities of human body to collect bio-mechanical data. This data may be transmitted over a network to a server, where it is analyzed, and feedback may be provided in real time on the bio-mechanical and gait parameters experienced by the user's body while performing any particular activity. The device further may allow specialists and experts located anywhere in the world to analyze this real time data and give feedback.
patents.title: [USA] DEVICES FOR MEASURING HUMAN GAIT AND RELATED METHODS OF USE

headline: Partnering with PTs to Advance Care with AI-Powered Solutions | Let's Connect!

publications.name: Smartphone IMU Integration: Precision Boost for Sit-to-Stand Test with the Equilibrium Mobile Application
publications.description:
Presented at 14th National Conference Scientifica 2024 on "Sports Medicine & Rehabilitation Science", by Sancheti College of Physiotherapy, India, 17-18th February, 2024.

ABSTRACT: This study introduces an innovative approach that integrates the Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensor of a smartphone for conducting the 5 Times Sit to Stand Test (5xSST) through the Equilibrium by Vayu Technology (EQ) mobile application. Engaging a sample of 16 participants, the research utilized the EQ mobile application for data acquisition during the 5xSST, in parallel with high-speed video recording of the participants executing the test. The video footage was then rigorously annotated by three independent experts. A comparative analysis of the data from the EQ mobile application and the annotated video revealed a significant level of precision, matching, and/or surpassing benchmarks set in existing research. Additionally, this study incorporates kinematic analysis for the 5 Times Sit to Stand Test (5xSST), providing a comprehensive evaluation of participants' movements. The Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) of this method stands at 3.26%, notably better than the results of traditional methods. The absolute error for the total duration of the 5xSST was recorded at 0.16 ± 0.1 seconds, which is consistent with the ranges reported in the literature. Additionally, a percentage error of 1.3 ± 0.84% highlights the accuracy and reliability of this smartphone-based approach. This study marks a significant advancement in functional mobility assessments, leveraging mobile technology to achieve greater precision and methodological rigor, thereby contributing a valuable perspective to the domain of health assessments.

Keywords: Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), 5 Times Sit to Stand Test (5xSST), Equilibrium (EQ) mobile application, Kinematic analysis, Functional mobility assessments, Smartphone-based health assessment, Precision and accuracy.
publications.publisher: International Journal of Health Sciences and Research (http://www.ijhsr.org), Volume14; Issue: 3; March 2024

message.text:
Excited to share a glimpse into our latest project at Vayu: "Unlocking Performance Insights: How does Player A’s Vertical Jump and Run Gait compare to his cohort of Male Football Players at AUS?"

In this video, our talented team member Devesh Nihalani showcases the innovative Equilibrium app, which plays a pivotal role in conducting a comprehensive group-level performance evaluation for Male Football Players at the American University of Sharjah. By leveraging data from the Run, Vertical Jump, and T-Test, we aim not only to optimize performance but also to minimize the risk of injuries. ⚽️🔍

Stay tuned for more updates on how we're revolutionizing sports performance analysis!

#SportsScience #PerformanceOptimization #Football #Equilibrium #DataDrivenInsights

Unlocking Performance Insights: How does Player A’s Vertical Jump and Run Gait compare to his cohort of Male Football Players at AUS? 

In the video, our very own Devesh Nihalani, uses the Equilibrium app to spearhead a comprehensive group level performance evaluation for Male Football Players at American University of Sharjah, harnessing the power of the Run, Vertical Jump and T-Test to optimize performance while minimizing injury risk. ⚽️🔍

Special thanks to coach Essam Abu Touk 👍🏽

#Equilibrium #PerformanceAnalysis #InjuryPrevention #VayuTechnology #Biomechanics #Sports #Football #Sharjah 

Karan Kanchan 
Devesh Nihalani 
Tanvi Lad 
Bilal Tahhan 
American University of Sharjah
Grateful for the acknowledgment from Dilip Kumar for our innovations in the Health and Fitness startup space! Let’s keep pushing boundaries!

Health, fitness and sports startups in India you should know off🇮🇳
This is the 11th list in the series.


Why i share these startups every week? The reason is this https://lnkd.in/gmEh_WTF

These are companies we've met at Rainmatter Health. These are entrepreneurs solving for problems across different spectrum of health, fitness, nutrition & sports. Everyone should know about their work. Have no vested interest but cheering for these founders and their company to make an impact. 

Ok, the 11th list

Setu Nutrition - New age supplements solutions for your health needs.
Founder - Nihaal M.

belong - An offline experience to your health longevity programming. 
Founder- Prasanna Akella, Meyyappan Thenappan

Vayu Technology - Using sensors to evaluate and measure your fitness progress.
Founder - Karan Kanchan, Prathamesh Mantri

Cureous - Medical tech company building solutions bedridden patients.
Founder- Asish Mohandas

Decode Age® -  Building solutions for biomarker testing, therapeutics and interventions for longevity. 
Founders - Darshit Patel, Parth Amin, Rakesh Somani

The Fuller Life- A platform for employee wellbeing from health, fitness to diagnostics.
Founder - Arvind Krishnan

Unbox Health- Building a trusted platform that rates packaged foods and health supplements.  
Founder - Arjun Anjaria

Machaxi - Managing and operating sports facilities to offer best in class coaching and pay and play experiences. 
Founders - Pratish Raj ,  Tushar Raj, Ashish Anand

Leela Life - A marketplace to experience traditional and modern Indian wellbeing solutions.
Founders- Nishant Pradhan , Hari Nair, Heather Dominiak

Vipasyin - A platform to offer support for sexual and reproductive health needs. 
Founders - Jasmine George , Manu Raveendran   

SporTech Innovation Lab Pvt Ltd- Building an ecosystem of products to support  aspiring and playing professional athletes for their everyday needs. 
Founders - Sanand Salil Mitra , Pinaze S Mitra (PhD)

Best way to cheer for these startups is to either be a customer or share their work with others. If you are solving for health, fitness & sports in India and Rainmatter can be of any help, i'm open to talk. Do reachout.
🌟 Honored to have been part of the AI in Sport workshop at Loughborough University! 🌟

Vayu Technology is extremely thrilled to have been part of the AI in Sport workshop at Loughborough University! It was an incredible opportunity to share our insights among esteemed academics, researchers, and industry leaders. 

Huge thanks to Mark King and Andy Motch for their support in making this happen!

Excited about the potential collaborations ahead, we're eager to explore how we can leverage AI to enhance the performance and prevent injuries for athletes of all levels. Let's unlock new possibilities together! 🌟

#AISport #CollaborationGoals #LoughboroughUniversity #VayuTechnology #Equilibrium #ArtificialIntelligence #Biomechanics #Performance #InjuryPrevention

Andy Motch  
Mark King 
Karan Kanchan 
Tanvi Lad
Devesh Nihalani
